data.title: The Neighbourhood Wiki
data.meta_description: "Sweater Weather" is the fourth song by American alternative band The Neighbourhood from their debut extended play (EP), I'm Sorry.... It was originally released as a single on March 28th, 2012 under The [R]evolve Group. It was later featured on their debut studio album, I Love You., where it...

In California with my toes in the sand
